title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. I, art. 1, pt. 70 - Introduction And Definitions
content:

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. I, art. 1, pt. 70

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 472[1], 475, 482-a, 488, 1142[1], 1250; art. 20; L. 2002, ch. 1; L. 2008, ch. 57, part RR-1; L. 2010, ch. 134, part D
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
